original_text: Offer these together with their drink offerings, in addition to the regular burnt offering and its grain offering. Be sure the animals are without defect.
korean_text: 너희는 다 흠 없는 것으로 상번제와 그 소제와 전제 외에 그것들을 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Offer these together with their drink offerings
in addition to the regular burnt offering
Be sure the animals are without defect
sentences.korean_translation: 動物が欠点のないことを確認しなさい
